entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Hopewell
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fundy Park (Alma) 04:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
Temperature: 1.9°C
Humidity: 58 %
Dewpoint: -5.6°C
Wind: NNE 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to ice pellets near noon then changing to snow mixed with ice pellets this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early this afternoon. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 10 except minus 14 in low lying areas. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Friday 17 February 2023
